review_text: Great communication! Host was very responsive and check in was easy. Location was great; right downtown. The place met my expectations.
I was looking for a place to stay while in town for MSU graduation. This was the perfect spot! Quiet, clean, and convenient. The host, Karen, was very responsive and nice. Thank you so much!
Good place, but the air conditioner and heater were noisy

We were in town for our daughter’s graduation from MSU. The current prices of hotels this weekend were triple the cost and this was a cute and in a convenient location. I loved the access to a kitchen unlike in a hotel room where you have to go everywhere for food and drinks. They even provide the shower necessities (shampoo, conditioner, and shower gel) they also had coffee and sweetener for the coffee maker. Really a nice space for a few nights. If I had more time, I’d love to have walked around the capital. Cute area!
If ever in Lansing again, I’d stay here
Great spot - close to the Lansing Center. Made everything easy for my trip.
Quick communication, clean space, easy check-in and check-out, gorgeous location
I had a great time i love the space i would definitely be there again

This was a darling place, very spacious and open, right in the heart of Lansing. Walking distance to many little cafes and restaurants. It was charming, with and industrial vibe, cute kitchen and bathroom, and comfortable bed. I would most definitely stay there any time I'm back in the Lansing area. Very highly recommend!
Very good instructions and comfortable place to stay!
Loved the apartment and I was very relaxed during my stay. Thank you again!
Stayed for a night and it was a perfect location. Nice place to stay if you have business downtown! Across the street from the capital and convention center.
super cute loft, worked great as a photography studio for the weekend!! clients loved it!!
Extremely clean and quiet place. Loved it!

This was such a great place for the value! We only stayed one night for an event at the Lansing Center, but everything was perfect. Very responsive host, arranging our stay late the night before. Clean space with everything we needed! Highly recommend staying here.
awesome place for 2. I would totally go there again anytime
Everything was great. Check in was easy and the apartment was just like the pictures. Will stay there again if in Lansing
We had a wonderful stay. perfect location if you have an event at Grewal Hall!
Clean, good value, and close to the capital.
Beautiful place! Super clean & modern! Loved this stay. Host was very kind & responsive (: would love to stay again!
Beautiful spot, I really enjoyed my stay here for a work trip. Thank you!

We stayed for one night and the location was excellent. Plenty of Free street parking right in front of condo. Very walkable.
The place itself was just ok. It was dark inside and sort of stinky. Not unbearable, but slightly unpleasant. The heat was on too high, so woke up with dry mouth. We found the thermostat in the morning, so totally our fault. The bed was ok, but there is a sky light right above your face, so we moved our pillows to the foot of the bed so the light was not in our eyes. I thought it was a little pricey for what it was, but still 40.00 less than hotel and you don’t have to pay parking fee. So, I would stay again just for location and price.
I think the owners care about this feedback, so I’m not complaining…just trying to give feed back that might help make the next tenant more comfortable. All easy fixes. Move bed, more light in bathroom, living room and kitchen and get rid of smell. Maybe natural oil diffuser with lavender?

This apartment is surrounded by wonderful shops and eateries. The host gave great detailed instructions and was very responsive. We would recommend this place for anyone in need of a stay in the heart of downtown Lansing! The layout and design is very unique with exposed bricks and a modern industrial very cool vibe. It was also very quiet at night and good for traveling with a toddler. A++!!!!
Great place and great host. The only request I have for them is to shift the bathroom bulb from yellow to White. But its best place to stay if u are in Lansing Area.
Great place. Very convenient for visiting the Capital.
Clean and quiet. Perfect stay.
Could not have been better for what we needed. An event downtown. Got us out of the cold. No traffic to fight. Great clean space!

This is the cleanest, coolest place! Hosts are excellent and provide everything you need for your stay. Love the excellent checkin instructions. Best night’s sleep I’ve had in a very long time. Would absolutely stay again.
has a good night away
Great stay, peace and quiet, hosts were great and communicative when necessary. Place was clean and as described. Will stay at this location time and time again
Thank you the stay was great as always.

The apartment location was absolutely perfect for a quick trip to attend an event at the lansing center. The apartment was clean and quite and secure. The host was friendly and communicated with us to make sure we got checked in okay. Overall great find for a trip we booked last minute.
Great location! weather sucked lol. but cozy place.
Thank you
Thank you I have enjoyed my stays .
We had a wonderful stay in Lansing!
The place was beautiful and peaceeful
Always a great stay in downtown Lansing at this loft!

So close to the capital building and in walking distance to a lot of places, we parked in the garage they supplied parking to and walked everywhere we wanted to go from there, brewery, stores, restaurants, etc. The place was super easy and convenient to get into, had no issues at all, was only a little confused with parking at first, but the host was quick in response to help. The space was super clean and everything worked, so we had no complaints at all during our stay and very much enjoyed it!! Highly recommend!

Space was very clean, easy to find, and has a great location for exploring downtown. Hosts left clear instructions and were very responsive if needed. If we come back to Lansing, we will definitely book here again.

This was my second time staying in this location and it's great - clean, quiet, and convenient to downtown and East Lansing. Large TV with streaming options, and free parking is an added bonus. I'm sure I will be back!

This was a nice quaint apartment with everything you need and well stocked appliances. its not designed for long stays but for a quick trip. The bed was extremely comfortable and the cool sky light provided a window to the fully enclosed apartment.
Great location in the area you want to be in Lansing.
The space was clean, the hosts diligent and friendly. Overall, a very stress-free and pleasant experience. I'll probably be looking for this spot if i'm in the area again.
Flexible check in was very helpful
Easy to access. The hosts were helpful. Comfortable.
Spacious and private, it had all the convenience and comfort I needed.
Great loft with great location!

This was a great place to stay for a couple days. Close to everything I needed and I found the place to have everything I needed just as described. I will plan to stay again when I need to be in Lansing.

We had a great stay in the loft. The area was very pleasant and did not have any issues. The portable air conditioner was very loud but that was our only issue. The support staff was very helpful. The location was perfect, we biked everywhere. We would stay in the loft again if we ever come back.
Great Location!!
The place was very clean. Me and my husband loves it....I will go back

This apartment was perfect. It was close to everything I needed, spacious and lovely. Every need was met and the hosts were very pleasant and easy to communicate with. Very clear instructions too. Thank you for a lovely two nights.
Staying here was an absolute joy. The studio is spacious and very clean. The neighborhood it's in is just the cherry on top. Would definitely stay here in the future!

The place seems to be on the verge between a developed, nice area, and something more questionable. That said, the apartments felt secure, and there were lots of close, walkable options. It was clean and the use of the space was ingenious and artistic. Highly Recommend!

Goldilocks was such a pleasure to work with. I was traveling with 2 teens and a busy soccer schedule and adorable little studio apt was so easy to navigate.
Of significance, Goldilocks was promptly available at all hours of the night when I had a bizarre after hours request. So helpful and attentive!!
The Capital building is gorgeous at night and was beautifully lit up on our arrival. Coffee, little market, dining all very close & convenient.
I will be back and I highly recommend!!
Great place to stay!
The place was amazing and had an excellent location.
It was everything I had expected.
Cool place in a great location. I love this little strip of downtown.
Great spot to stay
We had a great time and loved the location!
Great place! Regular customer here
I always have a good stay at Goldilocks place. Always clean, never noisy and always comfortable.

Goldilocks unit was as described. When I encountered an unexpected problem in the unit, they quickly relocated me to a different unit in the same building with no fuss. Communications were prompt, complete, and reached me via the App and directly by phone. I appreciated their flexibility and responsiveness.
Perfect listing!
Amazing place! Enjoyed my stay

Close to MSU, not a lot to do otherwise. Basement is well stocked, good place to stay, but thin walls and creaky stairs means you'll hear anyone else in the house. Tough to beat for the price!
Suellen, however, was lovely! I'll be back next time I'm in town.
It was a very pleasant short stay.

I had a comfortable stay at Suellen's basement apartment. She is a wonderful host, and I recommend staying in her space. One thing to note is if you're taller than 6 feet, you'll need to watch your head because of the low ceiling (including fan).

I wish I could give Sueellen 5 stars. The price was fantastic and the space provided everything that I required. The reason that I give it 4 stars is because she seemed annoyed when I asked for clarification regarding her house rules and instructions. Twice she asked "Didn't you read my message? I said..." and then answered my question in a condescending way. I'm 52 but was made to feel like I was a bad child that wasn't listening to her. I tend to repeat information back to make sure I hear things correctly and she seemed annoyed. I wanted to think of her as warm and friendly like all of the other reviewers but I found her to be impatient with me. I arrived in the evening after a 5 hour drive so maybe my brain wasn't processing things as quickly as she'd like. The day I checked out I handed her the keys and she seemed annoyed that I didn't see her message to leave them on the table. I debated on writing this but it was a disconnect that she may need to be aware of for future guests.

Suellen was a perfect host, offering a comfortable apartment that was clean and well stocked with basics in the kitchen and living room. The bed was comfortable and we were able to settle in with ease. The garden was beautiful and the neighborhood was quiet and very walkable. We would happily stay with Suellen again.
Very nice basement apartment, it worked great for my entire stay. Suellen was a wonderful host!

Suellen’s apt is clean, quiet and private. Fully furnished kitchen (+ paper plates, napkins, oil, seasonings, etc.) Cooking is on 2 burner hot plate but it works fine. Very comfortable mattress, soothing, refreshing shower & products. Lots of restaurants, large mall & movie theater easily accessible. Stairs are a bit challenging for age 80+ folks, but manageable. Couch is not comfortable seating. Overall, our stay was great. Host is cordial & accessible.

A wonderful, relaxing retreat, full, clean, and spacious basement apartment. Could be quite independent, if that’s your desire. Host is very outgoing and we had a couple of interesting conversations about all manners of things. She was also very respectful of privacy. Beautiful, quiet area with several cool venues and restaurants.
Was incredible!
Suellen was an amazing and gracious host! The art is so cool and she is. Joy to spend timeout vacation with!
Top top-notch basement efficiency with everything in a nice middle-class neighborhood. The other reviews don't lie, this is how airbnb's should be done.
Suellen is so nice everything was perfect for my stay.

Best AirBNB stay ever! Suellen is a gem and a wealth of insights, stories and jokes. I needed privacy, a kitchen, good wifi and easy access to Michigan State University and Suellen's property, in a delightful historic neighborhood was perfect!

I travel often and this is the cleanest Airbnb you’ll find. Suellen exhibits pride in ownership and it’s reflected in the presentation and amenities. Small things, just like the plates and silverware being… better than the usual dollar store/mismatched sets in a typical Airbnb, more than enough towels, kitchen stocked with everything (foils, wraps, spices, utensils, etc) instead of the usual empty drawer with a burnt up hot pad and toast crumbs. You know what I’m talking about if you have ever stayed in a Airbnb while ballin on a budget.
Everything works. It doesn’t smell funny. There is a thermostat in the unit, I’ve had to call other hosts before and beg them to please come and turn the heat on because the thermostat was locked.
Unit is well set up and constructed, whereas many other Airbnb’s look like they had the local handyman as the architect and planner.

Exceptional Host and fantastic space !! Super comfortable and had absolutely everything I needed .. Quiet and cozy .. Suellen is an absolute delight as well as a great conversationalist.. Beautiful backyard with unique art pieces.
I look forward to booking again when I’m in Lansing .
Very friendly host, most well stocked Airbnb I’ve ever been to, highly recommend for long term stays.
Suellen was extremely friendly and the place is just as described! It was private and had everything I needed - would highly recommend!

Such a perfect place!! She was so accommodating when we had to switch plans! Such an amazing friendly host we loved staying there! Clean and comfortable! We will be back for sure, we would love to stay longer and visit more!!!

I stayed at Suellen's place for two months while being a Scholar at MSU. I cannot recommend this place enough. the apartment is cozy and has EVERYTHING you will ever need. When the bedside lamp stopped working I told Suellen and had a new one on the next day. The house is in a quiet, nice neighborhood, the next grocery store is a 5 min walk, the bus line 1, that connects to MSU is also a 5min walk.
But the best part was Suellen! I have never met such a warm, open, and caring person. I was impressed by her, her unique spirit, and also her artistic house. And she tells great jokes too. I was lucky to get to know her more and will be forever grateful for that.

Suellen is very warm and welcoming! She makes you feel at home. The studio was clean and quiet just as advertised. It has everything you need for a comfortable visit. The location is great as the bus stop is only a few minutes walk from the house. I really love her backyard, so artistic and interesting.
Thanks for a fabulous stay!
Great place and host. Exactly what I expected and hoped. What an incredible backyard too!

Suellen's place was great. You will be staying in a finished room in the basement of her house. I had the back door of her house as my private entrance. Everything was just as described. I had my own private restroom, shower, half-kitchen, sofa, tv with great cable and a comfortable bed. The neighborhood was peaceful and felt safe. Suellen's house is exactly halfway between downtown Lansing and Michigan State University. One night I took a 45 minute walk into downtown to visit the capitol building. The next night I walked 45 minutes the opposite direction to visit the many bars and restaurants in the University area. There are also ample scooters around that you can rent on an app and cruise around town on. Suellen was the best part of the whole experience! She was very friendly and we ended up having a couple long talks together. She made great local recommendations and couldn't have been more welcoming. It felt more like staying with a family member than a stranger.

I stayed with Suellen while I did a Co-op/internship with General Motors, from January-Augist 2023. Suellen is the textbook example of what it means to be hospitable. When I first arrived, we sat down, had a conversation, and got to know each other. She then took me for a ride in her car all around town, pointing out good places to shop, and good restaurants to eat at. Suellen's home is full of charm and her backyard is beautiful. It is located in a safe, nice little neighborhood. My Lansing-native coworkers described it as a secure little nook that a lot of grandparents live in. I would agree with that. Suellen is very nice, and knowledgeable too. I would suggest that you strike up a conversation with her. She has a lot of wisdom to share! did I mention funny jokes too? I couldn't have asked for a better host. 10/10 I would recommend that you stay here.
Suellen’s personal hospitality was fantastic. She was very welcoming, friendly and helpful. The place was very nice, clean and well equipped.
very nice n relaxing

Wonderful, neat, well appointed basement apartment. Suellen is an accommodating host and can be as hands-on or hands-off as is comfortable for you. The East side is always a wonderful place to stay in Lansing; great residential neighbourhood close to great local businesses. Overall, a comfortable homestay.
This place worked out perfect for my short stay!
This was my second stay and it was just as cozy and clean as the last time. Tucked away in a great little neighborhood that's close to everything.
Would stay here again.

Suellen was such an example of how to host and treat a guest. Whether her warm conversation, her superb hospitality, or the amazing space, we’ve found a place we can call home when we visit MSU as guests.
Very nice place, safe, comfortable and close to MSU.
Thank you
Everything was great!

Suellen is very kind, knowledgeable of the area and welcoming. The apartment was extremely clean, well stocked, comfortable bed, and close to MSU. The backyard is beautiful and creative. The listing is completely accurate. The apartment was private and cozy. I will definitely be back.

One word: wonderful! I really enjoy it.
The room is very big and it has all things we needed: Kitchen, large bed, sofa, TV, refrigerator, micro wave, individual bathroom, etc. And the room is very clean. I live very comfortable at this place.
Outside the house it is very beautiful and quiet, good place to hangout. And the public transportation is very near from the house. The bus station is only a few minutes walk from the house, if you have some friends at MSU you are able to visit them very easily.
Love it!

Very clean and well-presented basement studio. Excellent value and it was a pleasure to stay here and enjoy the beautiful garden. If you are over 6 ft, heed others’ advice that this is not the spot for you.
Suellen was very accommodating with my TV problems and brought another one to replace the broken one. Very nice host.

Suellen is a very energetic host with great recommendations of food places around town! She is prompt with communication and good stories and jokes to share in person☺️
She has a beautiful backyard

Suellen place is awesome and it is worth the price listed! Exactly the way it was described! Very great food recommendation! Suellen is a very well educated individual. If you have the time please take the time and learn a thing or two from her! Made my first experience at East Lansing the best!

My stay at Suellen's basement apartment was comfortable. The apartment had everything one might need for a long-term stay for two from the kitchen cutlery to extra linens. Her home as a beautiful backyard, which can be great for relaxing on a beautiful day. Her house is in a good location, close to East Lansing with reliable public transit. Suellen is a warm and gracious host. She put in every effort to make my stay comfortable. Communication with her was quick and easy.
Suellen was great and the space was perfect
Staying at Suellen’s was great! Her space is ample, she has provided all the comforts of home, and it is clean. The location is great for getting to MSU and/or downtown.

I stayed here for 3 weeks during one of my clinical rotations and it was great! Suellen was very welcoming and prompt with communication. The apartment was very clean and stocked with kitchen essentials. There is also a lovely back yard with a peaceful area to read\ work\ relax. Overall I really enjoyed my stay and would book again!

I traveled from SC to visit my boyfriend in prison. I needed a place to stay a couple nights during my visit. The private floor downstairs was cozy and tranquil. Her space provided me a break from my children, dog, and work, so I truly felt like I was on a vacation. I’m introverted and Suellen gave me privacy. I had DoorDash delivered one night and it even snowed the day I left. I was thankful to have a pleasant first Airbnb experience.

Suellen is very warm and welcoming. The room I rented was clean, private and had all the amenities I needed. She even had spices and little extras you may not think of when you’re traveling. The backyard/porch is colorful, artistic and interesting, yet serene.

Suellen is a wonderful host, and I would definitely book with her again in the future! My only comment is that if you are quite tall, the ceilings in the basement apartment might be too low for you, but I (5'5") personally had zero issues.

It was great experience for 2 months.
She is nice host and she was a good teacher for me.
It was my first time staying United States, but she shared me lots of the informations like the best restaurants, and guided me how to go to MSU. Thank you very much, Suellen!

This is an awesome place to stay if it's available to book.
Location is great as you can get anywhere without it being a drive. Shops, restaurants, parks and Michigan State are minutes away.
Suellen is an awesome host. She makes feel at home and part of her family. She goes above and beyond to make sure you're taken care of.
The apartment was exactly as advertised. Very comfortable and well laid out. Basic cooking supplies are also included. The fact she provides things like coffee helps you control your food budget. That's a huge plus.
I hope to book here again in future when I need to be back in Lansing.

Suellen is an amazing host! You can expect a warm stay in a prime location, minutes away from local attractions and venues. I have stayed there on 3 different occasions and it gets better every-time. It’s my favorite place to stay when I’m in town.

I stayed in the basement apartment for about 4 months as I finished school at MSU. I thoroughly enjoyed the space and Suellen had everything I needed (pots/pans, mugs, coffee, shampoo/conditioner, etc.). Suellen is a fantastic host who wants to ensure her guests are having the best experience possible. She is a great communicator and quickly replied whenever I had a question or update. In addition to the basement, you also have access to the washer and dryer, her backyard, and parking in the driveway or street.
If you stay at her place, be sure to ask her for a joke!
Great place to stay, super convenient to many places. wish I could have stayed longer. Books up fast, don't hesitate booking this place!

The home was very wonderful. Clean and stocked with everything a guest might need. Suellen (the host) is very grandmotherly which at times can be considered intrusive or rude but over all very sweet and easy to talk to.

First time to use Airbnb. Suellen's place was very clean and full of what you needed. Suellen is a kind and gently soul that will make you feel at home. I would not hesitate to book again "which I did" or recommend. Book it before some else does. A true treasure in Lansing.

Suellen is very nice, welcoming and friendly. Her place is just as described, and very reasonably priced, as well as in a convenient location (we loved the El Oasis food truck down the street on Michigan Ave.!). We had a good stay there.
I'd recommend this stay. She is so nice and caring

Suellen is wonderful - so warm and welcoming. Her basement apartment is full of little comforts to make you feel right at home, and the backyard is a dream! Bring layers if you get cold easily or are traveling in the winter - the basement can get a little chilly, but nothing unmanageable. Unfortunately, I wasn't able to stay for the whole time I had planned to due to a maintenance issue, but Suellen was so thoughtful, communicated quickly, and did everything she could to make my stay a pleasant one. I would recommend this place to anyone looking for a peaceful sanctuary and great conversation!

Suellen personifies hospitality, exhibited by her attention to the things a traveler may need, from a variety of cooking spices to paper clips and a pet hair roller! Above all, though, is her warm and welcoming self. Suellen gives a personal tour of the apartment and outside space, letting you know that your are to feel at home there. I highly, highly recommend! I would absolutely book here again if I am in the area. Thanks, Suellen!
This is a great apartment with all the amenities you might need and Suellen was the perfect host! I would definitely recommend staying here.
Enjoyed my stay!
10/10 would stay again.

Sueellen is a wonderful person and a great host. Funny, warm, and full of life and love. My husband and I enjoyed spending time with her. Her home is amazing. Great location, easy to get around. The downstairs space is cozy, well equipped, quiet. Good internet connection and ample space if you need to work. The garden is gorgeous. Highly recommend staying here.

Super host and very comfy accommodations. I give the bed and quilts an A+, important to me because most of my hours in the apartment were at night. Kitchen well-equipped for someone like me who likes to cook from scratch, with fresh foods. Back yard space to relax reflects the whimsy of this host, who is all about making a good experience for her guests. I totally want to return on my next visit to Lansing area, if she's not all booked up!

Suellen's house was amazing. I'm kind of introverted and I appreciate having a separate living space during my Airbnb stays. Her basement apartment was spacious and had more than I really needed. For someone staying multiple nights, you'd be very happy (I only stayed one night). The yard is big and incredible and includes art, sculptures, and a screened in porch. I'd definitely stay again if I was passing through.

Suellen is the best! One of the most personable, accommodating, and FUN AirBnB hosts we've ever had! Her place is right in the middle of all the Lansing/East Lansing points of interest. The place was cozy, clean, and nice. Her stories/jokes made our day:) We would definitely stay here again!
This is a great place to stay! It is very close to downtown Lansing and the MSU campus.
An absolutely excellent location and I could not ask for a better host!
Great host, great location and an overall great experience!

This is an excellent place to stay. Its location is ideal next to East Lansing on Lansing's east side. You're near everything from a funky blues club to all the freeways and the MSU campus. And Suellen is a wonderful host; this basement apt is spacious and out fitted with a complete kitchen with spices and teas and a raft of other things. It's just all terrific.
Beautiful gardens, lovely little apartment and great location.

Suellen was the most knowledgeable, unique, and creative host! Babes and I were lucky to have shared her space for the few days we were there! Would definitely recommend this for an extended stay or just a couple days!
If your looking for a quiet welcoming comfortable rest and beautiful artwork scenery this is the place for you! Slept so well.
Very clean and well kept
Great experience.

Excellent value. Suellen is very warm and welcoming. The backyard is an amazing spot. The apartment was just the right size w all the amenities. Comfy bed and sheets too. And I just loved the living room table- perfect for eating and working on a laptop. Hope to stay again.
Had a great experience. Would do it again

A great hostess! Clean, private space (having door locks) with own kitchen ( fully furnished with utensils, Tupperware and even spices!) and bathroom. Very close to bus stop. Miss Suellen is very helpful in answering questions or providing any information. She is a very well informed person who also likes to meet, greet and have a friendly conversation with her guest .
Pleasant stay

Beyond expectations! Suellen is very pleasant and knowledgeable about the surrounding community. The stay was quiet and the place had anything you'd need that you might not normally pack. Would stay again!
Nice place
Sue Ellen is a delight and her place is beyond expectations. Even her two chickens are friendly and welcoming. If im ever in Lansing I will stay here again hands down best Airbnb in Lansing.

Suellen's home is conveniently located in a pleasant neighborhood near the MSU campus. The apartment itself clean, cozy, private, and well-stocked with anything you might need, and the bed is super-comfortable. I was there in February, so I couldn't take advantage of the lovely porch and backyard, but I'll save that for my next trip. Finally, there's a reason Suellen is a superhost: she'll make you feel welcome, yet give you your own space -- and direct you to anything you might need or want to do anywhere around town. I'll be back!
Very nice old man. Very welcoming.

Suellen is a friendly and lovely host. She has a very welcoming way and a very comfortable apartment setting! I truly appreciated her ability to accommodate my last minute plans. The bed was so comfortable and everything was just perfect for my needs!
Great value! Amazing hospitality! Spotless and comfy!
Thanks Sullen!

This place is a treasure! It starts with a wonderful host, who has a beautiful, artistically decorated home. Suellen has unique and thoughtful touches that helped me feel at home right away. Long term stays are her speciality, and it shows in the comfort, care, and attention to details.
Suellen was an exclusive host. Loved staying with her and would stay with her again in a heartbeat. The place was exactly like the pics and I felt very comfortable.
Suellen was very friendly, spunky, & inviting! It’s a beautiful space and inexpensive.

Suellen was very hospitable, very kind and her home was very welcoming and close to almost everything. She made me feel welcome and I would absolutely recommend her space to any traveler. Thanks again!

It's no wonder that Suellen is a Super Host. She is friendly and accommodating. She has stocked the kitchen quite well. Her location was perfect for me, and her recommendation for a breakfast, was spot on. I did not want for anything during my stay.
Host was very responsive and welcoming. Apartment was clean and well-equipped.
A cute and clean efficiency unit in a great location. Suellen is possibly the nicest person on Earth.

Suellen is such a sweet host! She greets you for check-in and gives a quick run down of the space. Then she gives you the amount of privacy you like. She’s there if needed and is always up for a quick chat. The chickens in the backyard are the cutest girls you’ve ever seen! The space itself is exactly as described. Plenty of towels, great linens on the bed, comfy pillows. The kitchenette is stocked to help with cooking. Suellen also has lots of info about local stores and restaurants including maps and directions. The value is exceptional and I can’t wait to go back!
Suellen was the BEST host I’ve ever had! I highly recommend staying at her home. I was performing at Wharton Center and it was a very quick commute. Can’t wait to visit her again!

If youre in Lansing, you need to stay with Suellen. Her place is very charming and she is a great host. Had a great conversation with her and very much enjoyed the stay. The apartment space is cozy and has everything youd need and Suellen provided a ton of awesome local recommendations. I would definitely stay here again!

The basement apartment was absolutely perfect for what my friend and I needed. It's clean, comfortable, and private. Suellen was an excellent host! She chatted with us and introduced us to the chickens who were fantastic. This is a great place to stay with an extra perk of Suellen's hospitality.
Great space, affordable, and convenient location. The host was very warm and hospitable. I would certainly stay there again.
Suellen is a warm host who offers a clean place to stay which is close to all the main action in the Lansing area.
Great place to stay. Private and conveniently located. Suellen is the perfect hostess.
Suellen is great! It is a great place, she is super nice and knowledgeable about the area. We highly recommend her!
Fit my needs. Good space, nice host
The basement apartment was comfortable and had everything I needed (plus a supply of chocolate...). Suellen was a great host.
Great hospitality! I felt like I was at grandma’s house and I loved it. Great sense of humor and friendly. Thank you!
Outstanding space, exceptional hospitality. Suellen is a gem!

Great Value, Great Location, Great HOST! Suellen was wicked accommodating and available to answer any questions we had. The amenities were great and a quick walk to MSU campus and downtown East Lansing.
Very hospitable. Suellen is a big help. Understanding, flexible, and wants everything to go well for you. Would definitely stay again!
It was better than expected: comfortable, amenities, spacious, great location, great host, clean... everything anyone would ever hope for! If you are staying in Lansing, this is a great place!
Suellen was an excellent host. I will definitely be staying again next time I'm in the area

A cozy basement apartment perfect for a good sleep. Provides extras in the kitchen. The hens are super cute as well.
All around we would stay there again.
Excellent stay. Great value. Perfect location for doing work at MSU. I highly recommend this Airbnb location.
